Upload.FileUploadSuccessContent: You uploaded the file {file_name} successfully, thank you for your sharing.
Upload.FileCheckFailedContent: You uploaded the file {file_name} failed to scan, reason: {reason} (file check status: {file_check_status}). Please check and try again.
Upload.FileVirusReviewPendingContent: Your file {file_name} was flagged by malware scan and has entered admin review (Case #{malware_case_id}). Review deadline: {review_deadline}.
Upload.FileVirusReviewRequiredContent: File {file_name} uploaded by {uploader_name} was flagged by malware scan (Case #{malware_case_id}). Detected: {detected_viruses}. Review before {review_deadline}.
Upload.FileVirusFalsePositiveReleasedContent: Your file {file_name} (Case #{malware_case_id}) was reviewed as false positive and has been released.{review_note, select, null {} other { Note: {review_note}}}
Upload.FileVirusConfirmedDeletedContent: Your file {file_name} (Case #{malware_case_id}) was confirmed as harmful and removed. Current harmful upload count: {upload_injected_file_times}. Please note: if the system detects harmful content in your uploads for {malware_auto_ban_threshold} consecutive times, your account will be banned.{review_note, select, null {} other { Note: {review_note}}}

Reupload.FileReuploadedTitle: A file in your favorited game has been updated
Reupload.FileReuploadedContent: The file {file_name} in your favorited game {game_title_en, select, other {{game_title_en}} undefined {{game_title_jp, select, other {{game_title_jp}} undefined {{game_title_zh}}}}} has been updated.{reason, select, undefined {} other { Reason: {reason}}}
